full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI GIS BRJOD GA-YAS 'KHYIL DUNG GI RANG SGRA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SMON LAM THEG MCHOG LAM GYI BZHON PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
